name: adjectives-project

scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run build-css && npm run build-js && npm run build-json
scripts.build-js: (cd ts && tsc --project tsconfig.backend.json) && (cd ts && tsc --project tsconfig.frontend.json)
scripts.build-json: npm run clear-json && npm run update-json-from-yaml && npm run deduce
scripts.watch-ts: (cd ts && tsc -w --project tsconfig.backend.json) & (cd ts && tsc -w --project tsconfig.frontend.json)
scripts.clear: rm -r public/css && rm -r public/js && rm -r public/json && rm -r js

author: Jesse Vogel
description: The Adjectives Project is a project to collect mathematical definitions, properties, theorems and (counter)examples.
